Class ec.transform.ClassData 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.transform.ClassData
public class ClassData
extends Object
ClassData objects hold parsed data from class files. They can be destructively modified, something which may be done in the process of passing one through a ClassFilter. They may also be flattened back into an actual class-file-containing array of bytes, suitable for passing into ClassLoader.defineClass().

ClassData()
Construct an initially-empty ClassData.
ClassData(byte[])
Construct a ClassData based on the given array of bytes.

ClassData 
 public ClassData(byte bytes[]) throws BadClassFileException
Construct a ClassData based on the given array of bytes.

Parameters:
bytes - the bytes of the alleged class file
Throws: BadClassFileException
thrown if the array is not a well-formed class file.
ClassData 
 public ClassData()
Construct an initially-empty ClassData.
